ai-thag10.2:1.4_0: to be dwelling alone in a forest grove.
ai-thag10.2:2.2_0: to the wilderness praised by the Buddha.
ai-thag10.2:3.2_0: I’ll quickly enter the delightful forest,
ai-thag10.2:3.4_0: and is frequented by rutting elephants.
ai-thag10.2:4.1_0: In Sītavana, so full of flowers,
ai-thag10.2:5.3_0: in the great wood, so delightful,
ai-thag10.2:5.4_0: my task complete, free of defilements?
ai-thag10.2:6.1_0: This is what I want to do:
ai-thag10.2:6.4_0: for no-one can do another’s duty.
ai-thag10.2:7.4_0: and has attained the ending of defilements.
ai-thag10.2:9.1_0: In a forest grove covered with blossoms,
ai-thag10.2:9.2_0: in a cave so very cool,
ai-thag10.2:9.3_0: I take pleasure in the Mountainfold,
ai-thag10.2:9.4_0: happy with the happiness of freedom.
ai-thag10.2:10.1_0: I’ve got all I wished for
ai-thag10.2:10.2_0: like the moon on the fifteenth day.
ai-thag10.2:10.3_0: With the utter ending of all defilements,
ai-thag10.2:10.4_0: Now there is no further existence.”
